Photofeeler (https://www.photofeeler.com) | Software Engineers, Marketing Roles | REMOTE or Onsite near Boulder, CO

If you were a fan of the old OkCupid blog or Christian Rudder's "Dataclysm," you will love it here.

Photofeeler is a tool for photo feedback, but we're primarily a data science company. We do math to maximize the statistical value of small, noisy data samples. Our company is changing the future of online profiles.

The gig offers unparalleled freedom without beauracratic nonsense (think: can work remote, work flexible hours, no unnecessary meetings). Our users are eager and enthusiastic for everything that we build.

More info: https://www.photofeeler.com/jobs
